revision.text:
{{Infobox Network Adapter |image1 = <!-- Image filename --> |image1_size = <!-- Image size, ex.150px --> |caption = <!-- tagline --> |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = <!-- product page url only --> |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none -->
|brand = SMC |model = SMC8040TX |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = (02-1011-001) |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 08/14/2013 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/SMC_SMC8040TX |sernum = <!-- Serial number prefix --> |series = <!-- Device series --> |if = PCMCIA (16-bit) |if_bus_version = <!-- ie. 1.0, 1.1, 2.0, 2.2 --> |ifconnector = <!-- Interface Connector Type, Leave blank for none --> |formfactor = Type II
|vendor_id = 0149 |device_id = c1ab |subvendor_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |subdevice_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |id_string = "Dual Speed", "10/100 Port Attached PC Card" |fcc_id = MQ4FE1KMX |icid = <!-- Industry Canada ID, Leave blank for none --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board ID --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id --> |ethoui = 00:E0:98
|chip1 = D-Link;DL10022A; |chip2 = National Semiconductor;DP83846A; |chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip4 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->
|linuxdriv = pcnet_cs |windriv =
|eth_ports = 1 |eth_speed = 100MbE |eth_conn = 8P8C |eth_conn_dongle = |eth_standard = <!-- IEEE 802.3/3u/3ab --> |auto_mdix = <!-- Support automdix --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Support Jumbo frames -->
|is_manuf = No |manuf = AboCom |manuf_model = FE1KMX |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |flags = block diagram |accessible_UART = |accessible_JTAG = |category =
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 03/27/2000 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = 662698600278 |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B000123JUU |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Taiwan
|powledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |connactled = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |spdledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |leddupcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimmin = <!-- Size of device --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device -->
}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== The Windows HW ID strings for this card are... *<small>'''PCMCIA\Dual_Speed-10/100_Port_Attached_PC_Card-B5EF'''</small> *<small>'''PCMCIA\Dual_Speed-10/100_Port_Attached_PC_Card-0149-C1AB'''</small>
"FE1KMX REV:X20" and the '''PLOTECH''' logo is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :Note: A C2PC made 07/07/2000 changes (per FCC docs) the filter from a '''DELTA''' LF8275 to a 8275C. The device is specified as being identical besides this change.
The DL10022A appears to be NE2000 compatible. :It appears that [https://git.kernel.org/cgit/linux/kernel/git/torvalds/linux.git/tree/drivers/net/ethernet/8390/pcnet_cs.c '''pcnet_cs'''] [http://extern.fli4l.de/nics/show.php?begriff=on should work with this device] (and the PCMCIA device string seems to be in there too...).
[[Category:English Documentation]]
